dict.acceptation: 懒惰的；没精打采的；慢吞吞的；

sent.orig: In the Hibernate mapping file, by Configure the lazy attribute to determine the search strategy.
sent.trans: 在Hibernate映射文件中，通过在上配置lazy属性来确定检索策略。

sent.orig: If you lazy in your emails be lazy in your business dealings, too?
sent.trans: 如果你连写电子邮件都懒惰，那么，你做生意怎么会敬业呢？

sent.orig: I can readily believe that she is lazy at home-she is very lazy at school.
sent.trans: 我不难相信她在家很懒，她在学校就很懒。

sent.orig: A lazy sheep think its wool heavy.
I like this feeling so be lazy!
sent.trans: 我如此喜欢这种懒洋洋的感觉！
